dmca.title: URGENT: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Rosenfield, Kevin (SEA) [mailto:KRosenfield@prestongates.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 2004 11:55 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: URGENT: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement

 

 

I am an attorney for Valve Corporation.  Thank you for your prompt attention
to this matter.  I look forward to your confirmation that the infringing
material has been removed from your systems.

<<KA1RL208W==Planet DMCA.doc>> 

 Kevin A. Rosenfield 
PrestonlGateslEllis LLP 

925 Fourth Ave, Suite 2900 
Seattle, Washington  98104-1158 

Phone   (206) 370-6586 (direct) 
Fax     (206) 370-6309 (direct) 

email   krosenfield@prestongates.com 


---Attached File---
Kevin A. Rosenfield
krosenfield@prestongates.com
206-370-6586




August 31, 2004



URGENT/IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
+1-214-782-7800
abuse@theplanet.com 
legal-response@theplanet.com 

Re:  DMCA NOTICE OF ALLEGED COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services:
	
This letter serves as notification serves as notification under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
